collectionMetadata.name: Source of Cases Registered at the Community Mediation Centre
collectionMetadata.description: Shows source of registered cases through unique case identifier. Before 2014, the referrals from various sources were broken down into three main categories (Direct Intake, External Agency, Courts). From  2014, it is further broken down into the following categories: Direct Correspondence, Walk-ins, Applications through Contact Centre, External Agency Referrals (further broken down into 5 categories: Singapore Police Force (SPF), Housing and Development Board (HDB), Town Council, Member of Parliament, Others), Court-Ordered (Magistrate's Complaint) and Court-Ordered (Community Disputes Resolution Tribunal). Before 2014, the data reports "Direct Correspondence", "Walk-ins" and "Applications through Contact Centre" categories under the aggregated category titled "Direct Intake". The External Agency Referrals (Others) category includes referrals from other government agencies like NEA, NParks, AVA, Family Service Centres and Community Clubs.

datasetMetadata.name: Source of Cases Registered at the Community Mediation Centre
